description.narrative: 1.1.3 By 2015, the government addresses targeted gaps in institutional capacity at central and local levels to implement policies addressing the enrolment and completion of quality primary education, especially the most vulnerable and excluded boys and girls, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Disparity Reduction, Social Inclusion and Protection
